description:
Now there is not any API sample file of "unshelve a server" API,
and OpenStack API documentation[1] also does not describe the API.

[1]: http://api.openstack.org/api-ref-compute-ext.html
title: There is not any API sample file for 'unshelve a server' API

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/76751
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/76751
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=ccb68ab1cd50f00546794c4bda9acb2580d8b3a4
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit ccb68ab1cd50f00546794c4bda9acb2580d8b3a4
Author: Ken'ichi Ohmichi <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Feb 27 22:14:28 2014 +0900

    Add API sample files of "unshelve a server" API
    
    Now there are not API sample files of "unshelve a server" and
    "shelve-offload" APIs, and OpenStack API documentation also
    does not show these APIs.
    This patch adds these API sample files.
    
    DocImpact
    Closes-Bug: #1285482
    
    Change-Id: Idf797eb6723b94abae71a77c12bc2bb9b330fa28
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: From the nova patch listed above, copy the .json samples into the openstack/api-site repo. Create a WADL for unshelve and link to these JSON files in the WADL.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle
